name: CHARGE - World 1 DEMO
description: CHARGE is a lovely little retro platformer that I have been working on for the past few months. It features 2-bit colors with interchangeable palettes, over 100 levels, and a very brave little battery. I always enjoyed older platformer games when I was young, so I wanted to try and make my own! My planned release platforms are Steam, Xbox, Microsoft Store, and soon after launch, Nintendo Switch.
